How It Works

From Consultation to Launch

Every project follows a proven process designed to deliver exceptional results on time and within budget.

1

Free Consultation

We discuss your goals, challenges, and vision. I'll provide honest advice and a detailed project proposal.

30-60 minutes
2

Planning & Design

I create wireframes, mockups, and technical specifications. You'll see exactly what we're building before any money is paid.

1-2 weeks
3

Development

The coding begins! I provide regular updates and demos so you can see progress every step of the way.

2-8 weeks
4

Testing & Launch

Rigorous testing ensures everything works perfectly. Then we launch your new digital solution to the world!

1 week
5

Ongoing Support

I'm here for the long haul. Whether you need updates, new features, or just have questions, I've got your back.

Ongoing
